title: KRAFT RECIPE MAKERS Southwest Chicken and Bell Pepper Wrap

instructions.1: Place chicken in slow cooker; top with peppers. Add Simmer Sauce; cover.
instructions.2: Cook on LOW 6 to 8 hours (or on HIGH 3 to 4 hours).
instructions.3: 15 min. before serving, remove chicken from slow cooker; place on cutting board. Cool 10 min.; shred with 2 forks. Return to slow cooker. Stir in Finishing Sauce; cook, covered, on HIGH 15 min.

questions.question: Is peppers from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
Is finishing sauce live after Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
Can we serve (Step 3) and serve (Step 4) at the same time?
